questions.question: How many languages are used in the world today?
How many of those languages are waiting for a Bible translation to begin?
Which continent has the greatest need for new Bible translation work?
questions.correctText: C: Africa, with over 600 languages waiting for Bible translation projects.

questions.question: Which continent has the second greatest need for new Bible translation work?
questions.correctText: B: Asia, with over 500 languages waiting for Bible translation projects.

questions.question: Which continent has the third greatest need for new Bible translation work?
questions.correctText: C: The Pacific, with over 300 languages waiting for Bible translation projects.
